resources.string: Time to turn the camera on yourself! Get creative with reflections, shadows, or classic selfies!
Fluffy, moody, dramatic - capture the sky\'s ever-changing artwork.
Light creates magic! Find an interesting shadow and make it the star of your shot
Ripples, waves, raindrops - snap a moment where water plays the lead.
Find a pop of red in your world and make it stand out!
Recreate or capture something that brings back nostalgic vibes!
Golden hour magic! Chase the colors and capture the perfect evening glow.
Delicate, wild, or in full bloom - capture nature\'s most photogenic stars.
Show off what you love to do! Whether it\'s painting, gaming, or baking - snap away!
From sunsets to street signs, hunt down a bold burst of orange!
Share a spot that brings you peace, joy, or inspiration!
OOTD! Snap a photo of your look, whether it\'s comfy or runway-ready!
Capture the world\'s natural beauty - mountains, beaches, or cityscapes!
A little sunshine in your frame! Find something bright and cheerful!
The windows to the soul - zoom in on expressive, colorful, or unique eyes.
Strip away the color and let the contrast tell the story.
Get up close and personal! Find textures, details, or tiny worlds to explore!
Nature, neon, or a pop of emerald - green is everywhere, capture some from your life!
Capture a meaningful moment with a person (or pet) you adore!
What\'s essential in your life? Coffee, books, music? Show it off!
Stripes, spirals, or grids - find repetition in your surroundings.
Soft, dreamy lights - blue the background and make your subject shine!
Rain or shine, document the mood of the day!
Freeze a moment in time or embrace the blur of the moment.
A cool-toned treasure hunt - seek out something beautifully blue.
Create a striking outline against the light for a dramatic effect.
Capture a natural, unposed moment full of life and emotion!
Show perspective by capturing something far away!
Furry, feathery, or scaly - snap a creature in its element!
Find this regal color in nature, fashion, or everyday life!
